# (APPENDIX) Appendices {-}

# Appendix 1 - notation & abbreviations {#app1}

## Notation

For the hypothetical substance, X:

* $\text{plasma concentration }= P_{X}$  
* $\text{urine concentration }= U_{X}$  
* $\text{clearance }= C_{X}$  
* $\text{exchangeable X }= X_{e}$

## Glossary of abbreviations

+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|Term                                  |Abbreviation |
+======================================+=============+
|anion gap                             | $AG$        |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|corrected anion gap                   | $cAG$       |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|creatinine                            | $creat$     |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|electrolyte-free water                | $H_{2}O(e)$ |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|osmolality (in mOsm/kg)               | $Osm$       |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|osmolar gap                           | $OG$        |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|osmolar load (in milliosmoles, mOsm)  | $OL$        |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|other effective osmoles               | $OEOs$      |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|total body water                      | $TBW$       |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|transtubular potassium gradient       | $TTKG$      |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|urinary anion gap                     | $UAG$       |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|urinary osmolar gap                   | $UOG$       |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+
|urine flow rate                       | $\dot{V}$   |
+--------------------------------------+-------------+

+--------------------------------------+-------------+
